send

public void send(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                 TransportSendControl control)
Description copied from interface: TransportSender
Called by transport. By this call transport gives callee ownership over the buffer. Calls on TransportSendControl instance must be made from calling thread. Moreover, ownership is valid only for the time of call of this method. NOTE: these limitations allows efficient implementation.

Specified by:
send in interface TransportSender
